name: Heart Out
description:
Scoop up some of the doctors hearts to learn the ultimate truth about love. 

Filling your heart will make it harder to see but will lower the door at the end of the level where your love awaits.

>> Sorry for no intro levels :( would like to add them later >>

Player Controls

A & D : Left Right 

Space : Jump

Mouse: Grapple

/* Bugs: feel free to comment your favorite ;) */

after dying if your grapple is still attached just re click your mouse 0 button.
